actions.text: Amendment SA 3465 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 3465 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 3235. (consideration: CR S7129-7130; text: CR S7129-7130) To increase FCC?s authority to fine for indecent broadcasts and prevent further relaxation of the media ownership rules in order to stem the rise of indecent programming.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3465 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3465 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Dorgan to Amendment SA 3235.

amends_amendment.purpose: To increase the penalties for violations by television and radio broadcasters of the prohibitions against transmission of obscene, indecent, and profane language.

purpose: To increase FCC?s authority to fine for indecent broadcasts and prevent further relaxation of the media ownership rules in order to stem the rise of indecent programming.
